app.name: Trogdor Beta
app.long_description:
A recreation of the Homestar Runner Flash game "Trogdor" made with SDL. Currently in beta. Intended to be played with a sideways Wiimote, but a Gamecube controller also works.
https://github.com/Mips96/Trogdor-Reburninated
Trogdor is originally created and owned by the Brothers Chaps; credits are listed in-game.
